divs: sighting detailsat approximately 9:30pm last night 12\11\08, i was on my way home from class traveling on a lone country roadway; it was a clear, cold, and dark night with no haze or fog overhead. i have never seen a ufo before but do believe that they exist. what i saw can be described as a large, bright object that seemed at first like a meteor falling at a 110 degree angle, but without the trajectory trail as i have seen before in the past; the object seemed much larger that a meteor and much closer than something falling from space. i observed the object only for a few seconds as it descended below the horizon, probably around 3 or 4 seconds. as i got home and told my girlfriend about it, i recalled that when i saw the object i was driving right by the graveyard, and this made me wonder if this was in relation to a different kind of phenomena. whatever it was, i will probably wonder about it was for many years. it is time for our government to come clean.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Luling
There were no other sightings in Luling on or around November 30th 2002
